pkgmetadata.longdescription: # torweb#### torweb is a second development based application framework tornado1. **Install**Example for virtualenv: $ cd ~ $ mkdir env $ cd env $ virtualenv torweb $ ln -s ~/env/torweb/bin/python /usr/bin/python-torweb $ ln -s ~/env/torweb/bin/pip /usr/bin/pip-torweb $ pip-torweb install torweb $ ln -s ~/env/torweb/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torweb/start_app.py /usr/bin/torweb_startapp.py $ sudo chmod a+x /usr/bin/torweb_startapp.py2. **Getting started**Example for virtualenv torweb: Before start app of torweb, you'd have to install mysql, and set mysql root user and password.And then, edit "**/usr/bin/torweb_startapp.py**" below to your username and password: MYSQL_ROOT_USER = "root" MYSQL_ROOT_PASS = "1"Next, do follows to start you first application named torweb. $ cd ~ $ mkdir projects $ cd projects $ torweb_startapp.py test $ cd test $ python-torweb dev_server.py [2013-10-25 10:53:18] * app server is running on http://0.0.0.0:8888 [2013-10-25 10:53:18] * restart with reloadif you have got above tips, your first application has been built.
